actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from the definition of an unrelated trade or business qualified convention and trade shows activities carried out by an organization described in section 501(c)(3).

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit tax-exempt organizations to conduct conventions and trade show activities designed to educate individuals engaged in a particular industry about new products and services or new rules or regulations affecting such industry without subjecting such exempt organization to the unrelated business tax.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from the definition of an unrelated trade or business qualified convention and trade shows activities carried out by an organization described in section 501(c)(3).
